name: Maze Jogger: Rerevengeance
description:
(When you start playing, just press 'Ok' to the first error message that pops up - I promise it's supposed to happen)

Welcome to the thrilling world of Maze Jogger: Rerevengeance. Play as Jetstream Sam to reclaim your hardy & loyal gang of mercenaries (Senator Armstrong - a unique politician, Scout - a special individual, & Monsoon - a disgraced meme philosopher), on your mission to find the sacred plastic artefact to rid the world of the legendary Tortoise that has been terrorising your crew, and everyone on the face of the planet.

Credit to Konami for assets of Senator Armstrong, Jetstream Sam, & Monsoon - used in a parodical manner, in accordance with fair use.

Thanks to 15.ai for their TTS for Scout, and ClipChamp for its royalty free SFX & Music.
